meanings.definition: The central or most important part of a country, region, or area.
meanings.sent1: The heartlands of the city are where most of the population lives.
meanings.sent2: Farmers play a crucial role in the heartlands of the country.
meanings.sent3: The heartlands of the forest were filled with chirping birds and rustling leaves.
meanings.sent4: In the heartlands of the desert, the sun reigns supreme, scorching everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the heartlands of the continent revealed stunning landscapes and diverse cultures.

meanings.definition: The essential or most vital part of something.
meanings.sent1: Education is the heartlands of a successful career.
meanings.sent2: Love and compassion form the heartlands of strong relationships.
meanings.sent3: Laughter is the heartlands of a joyful heart.
meanings.sent4: Trust is the heartlands that hold friendships together.
meanings.sent5: Hard work and dedication are the heartlands of achieving dreams.
